english.segment1: Im swept away in this moment. I feel your heartbeat next to mine. My hands are trembling. Its overwhelming
english.segment2: A whisper breaks through the silence. A vow to test the breadth of time. Until forever, Ill be forever yours
english.segment3: Not just tonight. Im by your side. For all your life
english.segment4: Til death comes between us. And the heavens steal you away. Ill stay yours forever. Dont you worry, dont be afraid
english.segment5: The heart can shift like a shadow. The deepest passions start to wane. Stay ever tender. Never surrender
english.segment6: Come waltz with me through the twilight. And we will dance as seasons pass. We move together. Ill be forever yours
english.segment7: So hold me tight. Say youll be mine. For all your life
english.segment9: So all we have is this moment. But moments come and go so fast. Until forever. Ill be forever yours
english.segment10: There is no other. I am forever yours
